creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a bride on a high, small covered porch, with her veil blowing behind her, her bridal bouquet falling in LRQ toward a group of people in LRC; man taking photographer in LLQ
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard / JOANNE LEONARD
title: Bride Throws Bouquet
